au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=L2=12m_central_apx10
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(11200,0) # Drive guide to g3 driveGuide(guideConfig.g3) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g3) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(41, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(41, 0) driveBsz(258)
